client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Identifies which app is making the request. Obtain this value from the Keys tab on the app profile via My Apps on the developer site. There are two versions of this key: development and production.

client_secret.description: Obtain this value from the Keys tab on the app profile via My Apps on the developer site. There are two versions of this key: development and production.
client_secret.title: Client Secret

refresh_token.description: A token used when refreshing the access token.
refresh_token.title: Refresh Token

access_token.description: Access token fot making authenticated requests.
access_token.title: Access Token

token_expiry_date.title: Token Expiry Date
token_expiry_date.description: The date-time when the access token should be refreshed.

realm_id.description: Labeled Company ID. The Make API Calls panel is populated with the realm id and the current access token.
realm_id.title: Realm ID

start_date.description: The default value to use if no bookmark exists for an endpoint (rfc3339 date string). E.g, 2021-03-20T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.
start_date.title: Start Date

sandbox.description: Determines whether to use the sandbox or production environment.
sandbox.title: Sandbox
